contest-event.event-date:
June 24, 1899 D Parr (St Helens) Contest
Parr (St Helens) Contest 0 Test Piece Contest
parr-st-helens-contest
None
Sunny Spain
Parr, St. Helens, Lancashire 2nd annual contest promoted by Parr Public band. 1st prize £8, 2nd prize £5, 3rd prize £3 and 4th prize £2 divided between Parr Temperance and Ferranti's Works, 5th prize £1. March contest 1st (£1) Sutton Road, 2nd (10s.) Parr Temperance. 7 bands competed.
April 14, 2012, 11:02 a.m. July 28, 2019, 8:30 a.m.
1 Earlestown Viaduct William Rimmer
2 Sutton Road Christopher Smith
3 Parr Temperance William Appleton
3 Ferranti's Works Walter Hall
5 Tyldesley Wesleyan Temperance Edward Gittins
Unknown Result Heaton Park J. C. Hopkinson
Unknown Result Widnes St. Mary's John James Brady
